org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class MaintenanceApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.MaintenanceApi

public class MaintenanceApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Maintenance API.

This class provides access to HQ's maintenance subsystem. Each of the methods in this class return Response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

Method Summary

          Get the MaintenanceEvent for this group.

Schedule a Group for maintenance.

Parameters:
groupId - The group id to schedule.
start - The start time for maintenance, in ephoch-millis.
end - The end time for maintenance, in ephoch-millis.
Returns:
The MaintenanceEvent for this Group.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
